scripts.say: Purifier went and disappeared at some point.
I wonder if it's really all over this time...
Even if it was a Siren with abnormal circumstances, it really was a good chance to get to know the enemy... It would have been nice if I could have gamed some more at the Resistance base.
Mm, jeez. It's unusual for me, but I've gotta agree with you... Well, you're right in that if all Sirens were like that, we wouldn't have to fight them.
Because they were a comrade who fought alongside us. Even if it's another Siren, if they're a good guy, they you should be friends with them.
Once we leave this area, we'll need to find a way back.
If it's that, the Commander and Akashi back at home base might know of some way of helping you guys out.
Beep Beep Beep!
I'm getting a reaction from the transmission machine! Communications have been restored!
Zuikaku? Zuikaku, are you alright?
It's Shoukaku!
That's good! Your communications must have finally been restored! Is everyone in the fleet alright?
Gosh, being stuck in this Mirror Sea for several made me feel super lonely!
For several days? What do you mean?
Umm, while we were on convoy duty while returning from a commission mission, we got sucked up into the Mirror Sea that suddenly popped up.
After searching around the Mirror Sea for several days, we were just now able to destroy the equipment responsible for the area and finally recovered our communications.
Is that so...? Has it really been that long since we've lost contact with you...?
E-Eh?
Is it possible that this phenomenon resulted in a different flow of time inside the Mirror Sea compared to outside of it?
That's impossible, nya. The laws of space would be broken, nya.
Either way, it seems like it really happened... It seems that I really do need to study this Mirror Sea incident.
Come to think of it, the people around you are...
Ah, these girls are members of an organization called Hololive... Anyway, these girls are comrades who came from the other world that got entangled with ours and arrived here.
Comrades who arrived from another world - isn't this a common trope, nya?
Well, if you mumble about the Siren equipment that was left in the area the Mirror Sea appeared in, it'll work out somehow!
Guys, hurry up and come back~ Everyone's worried about you, you know?
Ah, and one more thing...
You guys did a great job. And, welcome to our world~
